resources.string: Do not disturb while still (i.e. not moving) and being at/near a cinema. Only works in Hesse, Germany.
When changing the activity from anything to running, increase the volume by 20%. After stopping, decrease by 20%.
Remind me that I wanted to shop something when being near a shop. If available, prompt to open the notes app. Only works in Hesse, Germany.
It seems like you started running. Raising volume by 20%.
It seems like you stopped running. Lowering volume by 20%.
You wanted to be reminded when near a shop.
You seem to be watching a movie in a cinema. Disabling any sound.
AutoAssist requires do not disturb access.

This is an example app only! The methods might be power consuming and not optimised. This app is only a proof of concept and should not be used otherwise. This app also works only in Hesse, Germany as the location data is hardcoded.
This app contains data from the OpenStreetMap database.
